meanings.definition: Not conforming to traditional masculine stereotypes.
meanings.sent1: He felt uncomfortable wearing pink because he thought it was too unmacho.
meanings.sent2: The boy was teased for his unmacho choice of playing with dolls instead of toy cars.
meanings.sent3: The unmacho man surprised everyone by choosing to knit a sweater for his dog.
meanings.sent4: His unmacho demeanor was like a bright light in a room full of shadows.
meanings.sent5: The unmacho outfit he wore to the party made him stand out in a sea of suits.

meanings.definition: Lacking qualities or characteristics typically associated with masculinity.
meanings.sent1: The unmacho cat was afraid of mice and preferred to stay indoors.
meanings.sent2: His unmacho voice was soft and gentle, unlike the deep tones usually associated with men.
meanings.sent3: The unmacho flower in the garden stood out among the more robust plants.
meanings.sent4: Her unmacho strength came from her determination and resilience.
meanings.sent5: The unmacho painting depicted a scene of vulnerability and emotion.
